title: for the love of god nerf evelynn already
body:
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/198412302557380608/485022762432200714/unknown.png

best jungler in KR

permaban in all high elos

can charm you without landing her skillshots and oneshot you from stealth too

like seriously you think this is fine but yorick was apparently too OP?

replies.body:
Let's break this down....

1) By looking at win statistics (albeit inaccurate), You need to not compare the average win rate. You need to compare the Skill capped win rates. Among players who pro play Evelynn, they are capping out at 59%.

That's extremely LOW for someone proficient with a champ. Her performance is heavily skill capped. That means you can only get "so good" with her and then you plateau. (Even Singed has a 63.1%)

2) Her ban rate is not the highest.

3) She just WAS indirectly nerfed with the Electrocute change. She doesn't pull level 2-3 First bloods anymore and falls off on per skirmish damage.

4) Her win rate has far more to do with players not trying to mitigate her or act correctly when she W's than actual output versus Risk. She's immobile, and can only cc one person, and extremely vulnerable. 

5) The real reason Evelynn is currently pulling high win rates has nothing at all to do with Evelynn. It has to do with the pre-eminence of Conquerer + {{item:3031}} effectively taking tanks out of the game in conjuction with {{item:3036}} {{item:3071}} {{item:3142}} etc.

Teams just aren't running the champs who make Evelynn's life living hell. They are running adc tops. They are running squishy mage mids, adc bots, squishy Supports, and fighter junglers and a few assassins.
{{champion:31}} {{champion:201}} {{champion:59}} {{champion:3}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:57}} {{champion:89}}{{champion:35}}  just aren't seeing much play. If they were, Evelynn would be averaging 49%. But because of the nerfs to {{item:3147}} and nerfs to tanks, Evelynn is having a free run of the squishies.
59% WR is not "extremely low" for when you master a champion... That's borderline average

Actually.... if you look at her top players, they are VERY close to average of the 59%.

If you look at most other champs, like {{champion:163}} who has a top player average of 61.3%, some of them are actually running 80%+ Win rates.

I'm not going to break it down to every champ, but Evelynn has no "Spread." Her range at mastery is about 10 points from her median.

Taliyah's "Spread" is about 17 points from her median.

What this means is..... that's as high as Evelynn goes. Based on skill, Taliyah and various other champs can get as high as 80%, or as low as 51% That's a 29 point spread. Eve's is 20.

There's more to stats than just pro win rates. And Evelynn places # 14 among junglers right now. And it's because her counters aren't seeing play in this item meta.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
Where's Thot Patrol Master Yoshikage Kira when you need him?
Killer Queen has already touched that blue buff.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

It's because Yorick being strong calls attention to the fact that yes, towers are in fact a fucking joke right now beyond compare, allowing Yorick to basically backdoor through 3 towers and an inhib before a team can respond. They don't want to fix turrets being made out of unmolded jello because that would effectively lengthen the game.

Evelynn on the other hand is what they would like to call "the meta" and would argue that she's "only strong because the game is geared toward her right now and tanks aren't being picked".

######This is ignoring the fact I have been a 3500 health Yorick with Sterakk's before and literally got bursted down in less than a second by an Evelynn. By herself.

Have you tried playing Eve in a game with bad teammates?   No priority mid?  Okay you never get a scuttle the entire game.  You can never counter jungle.  

Her dueling ability pre 6 is absolutely garbage.  She requires rotations from her team.  If she gets invaded she can't fight back easily.  If she gets ahead she can early game carry.  She can't late game carry.  

She's strong, but jax and graves are better.

> [{quoted}](name=Morgana Excellus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RYWxtHTE,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2018-08-31T18:57:33.946+0000)
>
> Have you tried playing Eve in a game with bad teammates?   No priority mid?  Okay you never get a scuttle the entire game.  You can never counter jungle.  
> 
> Her dueling ability pre 6 is absolutely garbage.  She requires rotations from her team.  If she gets invaded she can't fight back easily.  If she gets ahead she can early game carry.  She can't late game carry.  
> 
> She's strong, but jax and graves are better.

She's not a duelist lmao. She's an assassin jungler like shaco, kha and rengar.

Imma be honest, just use your goodam {{item:2055}} . In my last games i've seen 3 {{champion:28}} , witch 2 ere the enemy. I swear they were all useless. That was probably the player being bad, but still. {{champion:83}} on the other hand was bullying silver, and they had to nerf him obviously.  

Jokes aside, i can see {{champion:28}} being op in High elo, while on the other hand {{champion:83}} did not this nerf. Miss your E and there goes the trade. If the enemy it's smart, he will kill 1/2 ghouls before they can be usefull, and they still nerfed his damage.

i dont understand why the 3 spikes of her q can proc the charm its so dumb
only the initial q and her e should be able to proc it

> [{quoted}](name=Öskan,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RYWxtHTE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-08-31T10:41:34.797+0000)
>
> i dont understand why the 3 spikes of her q can proc the charm its so dumb
> only the initial q and her e should be able to proc it

Because she can't control the 3 other Q's for the most part. And if she AA'd you, then that's your fault for letting her get that damn close. Oh boy she charmed you then ulted away, so scary. It's not like she basically forfeited all the dps she could have done with her other abilities.

Her charm isn't her problem guys. Its super projected. The problem is that she bypasses most vision which will always be strong because it gives her a guaranteed edge as long as she isn't out of position. Also her counterplay isn't as clear because of her stealth it makes it hard to judge when its actually safe to make a play.

IMO they need to nerf her healing off of AP on her passive or make it more interactive. It just makes her way too safe currently so that even if she screws up half the time she can regen enough hp to make another attempt later while hiding in stealth.

> [{quoted}](name=Öskan,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RYWxtHTE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-08-31T10:41:34.797+0000)
>
> i dont understand why the 3 spikes of her q can proc the charm its so dumb
> only the initial q and her e should be able to proc it

Cause how we can make her semi binary under cover with skillshots ?
Do you just look up win rates and complain about the highest one?? Seems like that's what you're doing.
i mean doing that makes more sense than you would think
Win rates are biased though, Evelynn could be strong against popular champions, and since her play rate is kind of low at 6-7% it could be inflated by people who have played a lot of games on her

Like is there any point in asknig for eve nerfs before jhin?

Nothing to hope for unless he gets hit.
i really hate they put a charm on an assassin, let alone an invisible one. no matter what game im in she always has the most kills and the least deaths on her team
Or Maybe the Meta just favores her really hard

Evelynns kind of unfortunately designed to one shot whoever she jumps on. Like lets say she didn't, what would be her options from that point? There's no one in the game that she can afford just just hang around waiting for her CD's to come back up without being killed, so she'd have to ult out and have blown her entire kit for some poke? Then not be able to do it again until the ultie came back up. Unless she gets reworked, she's super volatile to damage nerfs and you'd see her become non-viable really quick if nerfed.

Nerf the damage in the game already.  Evelynn would be fine if her full combo did 50-60% of a squishy's health instead of 100%.  Marksmen and mages should do less burst too though, since it's a double-standard otherwise.  I am okay with an immobile juggernaut 100-0ing an assassin dumb enough to dive into their melee range though, since that requires a choice on their part compared to a mage/marksmen bursting from range.

> [{quoted}](name=Hemulen Magi,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RYWxtHTE,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2018-08-31T20:14:53.885+0000)
>
> Nerf the damage in the game already.  Evelynn would be fine if her full combo did 50-60% of a squishy's health instead of 100%.  Marksmen and mages should do less burst too though, since it's a double-standard otherwise.  I am okay with an immobile juggernaut 100-0ing an assassin dumb enough to dive into their melee range though, since that requires a choice on their part compared to a mage/marksmen bursting from range.

Wait

Why should an assassin's full combo only get a squishy to half health? Rofl

Because assassin combos often have very little counterplay because they take very little time to pull off and are often initiated from stealth or a long-range gapcloser.  If they do 100% of a squishy target's health then they even lack strategic counterplay since the squishy's only reliable option to not die is to afk.  Assassins should either rely on an ally to soften a target or finish a target after the assassin has used their combo, or the assassin should require multiple rounds of assassination attempts in which the target has made the mistake of being severely out of position or refuses to retreat and give up an advantage in their lane.  I also don't think marksmen or mages should burst assassins either, so it's a not a double standard.  I think it's a problem that marksmen do so much damage that an assassin currently needs to kill them in <2 seconds or the assassin gets bursted in return or the marksmen demolishes their whole team.  I don't like that either.

{{champion:28}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:107}} 

I hate all these  assholes

https://www.leagueofgraphs.com/champions/stats/diamond/by-winrate

damn spot 29? that is so problematic. Never mind rengar that offers even less counterplay on 7th spot, wukong on 10th, shaco on 22. damn dude she is so problematic.
{{champion:62}} was the problem, so shhh and listen to balance team they are smart and got the best game design ideas.
i found the irelia buffs almost as funny as the kassadin buffs
